product_description: A comprehensive Android application designed to support pregnant women throughout their pregnancy journey with health tracking, AI-powered chatbot assistance, and maternal guidance.
target_audience: Pregnant women, healthcare providers, and expectant families

key_features.name: User Authentication
key_features.description: Secure user registration and login using Firebase Authentication

key_features.name: AI Pregnancy Chatbot
key_features.description: Intelligent chatbot providing pregnancy-related advice and information

key_features.name: Health Tracking
key_features.description: Comprehensive health data input and monitoring system

key_features.name: Health Analysis
key_features.description: AI-powered health risk assessment using TensorFlow Lite

key_features.name: Maternal Guide
key_features.description: Educational content including diet plans, yoga exercises, and guidelines

key_features.name: Health Reports
key_features.description: Visual health reports and trend analysis

success_metrics: User engagement with health tracking features
Chatbot response accuracy and user satisfaction
